message.name: ERR_POSITION_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: Position name must not be identical to another position name.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_REPORTTO_POSITIONS_SELECTED
message.locale: Only one reporting to position should be selected. Please remove one of your selections using the clear button.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATION_UNIT_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot add position to this organization unit as the organization unit has been canceled.
Cannot add position to this organisation unit as the organisation unit has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_POSITION_XRV_USERS_EXIST
message.locale: You cannot cancel this position as there are still active users assigned to it.

message.name: ERR_POSITION_XRV_START_DATE_BEFORE_ORGANIZATION_UNIT_CREATION_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be before organization unit creation date.
Start date must not be before organisation unit creation date.

message.name: ERR_ORGANIZATION_UNIT_CLOSED
message.locale: A position cannot be added to a closed organization unit.
A position cannot be added to a closed organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_POSITION_XRV_CASE_OWNER
message.locale: This position is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be cancelled.
This position is the owner of one or more cases and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_POSITION_LOCATION_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This location is already assigned to the position.
This location is already assigned to the position.

message.name: ERR_POSITION_XFV_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: INF_POSITION_NO_MATCH_FOUND
message.locale: No records matched the criteria specified.
